column1: Local Foods////Their season's harvest salad got me rethink that salad can actually be worth $10. The porkchop burger on pretzel buns with apple and kale
column3: was a positive reinforcement on my tendency to order food with seemingly strange combination of ingredients. The crunchy chicken sandwich was also delicious. The only thing I'm not a fan of is the side with the soba noodle
column4: which was much too smushy for my liking. Though
column6: I'm pretty picky with my Asian noodles.
